[% server.logconfig %]

[% dir.localedir %] [% i18n.defaultlanguage %]
[% dir.dataexchange %]/export
[% dir.dataexchange %]/import
[% IF deployment.xmlstyle == 'multi-file' %]
[% ELSIF deployment.xmlstyle == 'all-in-one' %] [% INCLUDE database.xml FILTER indent(4) %] [% INCLUDE token.xml FILTER indent(4) %] [% ELSE %] [% THROW configerror 'Invalid XML output style specification (deployment.xmlstyle)' %] [% END %]
[% FOREACH realmsection = global.pkirealm %]
1
daemon -1
[% IF deployment.xmlstyle == 'multi-file' %]
[% ELSIF deployment.xmlstyle == 'all-in-one' %] [% INCLUDE profile.xml FILTER indent(6) %] [% END %]

[% IF $ca.cacert_alias %] [% $ca.cacert_alias %] [% $realmsection.name %] [% ELSIF $ca.cacert_identifier %] [% $ca.cacert_identifier %] [% ELSE %] [% THROW configerror 'Neither alias nor identifier specified for CA certificate.' %] [% END %]
[% IF $ca.crl_publication_file_format && $ca.crl_publication_file_name %]
[% $ca.crl_publication_file_name %] [% $ca.crl_publication_file_format %]
[% IF $ca.crl_issue_for %] [% FOREACH identifier = $ca.crl_issue_for %] [% $identifier %] [% END %] [% END %]
[% END %]
[% END %]

[% $entry.cert_alias %] [% $realmsection.name %]
[% ELSIF $entry.cert_identifier %]
[% $entry.cert_identifier %]
[% END %]
</[% $entry.type %]> [% END %]
[% IF deployment.xmlstyle == 'multi-file' %]
[% ELSIF deployment.xmlstyle == 'all-in-one' %] [% INCLUDE auth.xml FILTER indent(4) %] [% INCLUDE acl.xml FILTER indent(4) %] [% INCLUDE workflow.xml FILTER indent(4) %] [% END %]
